name: Mediterranean Assault: 1943
description:
Command Your Squad. Defeat The Enemy. Capture The Battlefield.

Command up to six other soldiers as you battle your way across diverse terrains. Delivering Hectic firefights and powerful vehicular combat, Mediterranean Assault: 1943 takes players across some of Italy and Africa's forgotten fronts. Players will take command of squads or vehicles to help the Allies conquer the battlefield by storming buildings, destroying emplacements and destroying the enemy.

  • Tactical Squad Combat - Find cover and use your squads to attack or have them fire while you outmanoeuvre enemy positions. Use your head to gain an advantage with the responsive AI teams at your command. Outflank, attack and win the day!

  • Exciting Firefights - A Third-Person Cover and fire system that creates exciting combat across a range of battlefield terrain, use trenches, machine guns and mortars to your advantage. Players must used the environment around them to help them and their team to secure objectives and complete tasks.

  • Large Terrains - Fight across large battlefields in the Italian and North African theatre, stunningly created to help the player experience the Second World War in third person combat!
